SEARCH
Module AM25_myShelfie
Package it.polimi.ingsw.controller

Class GameBroker

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.controller.GameBroker
public class GameBroker extends Object
This class represents the game broker. It manages the creation and deletion of lobbies, and the addition of players to a lobby.

  • Method Details

    • getLobbies

      public List<String> getLobbies()
      getLobbies return the names of the existing lobbies
      Returns:
      the list of existing lobbies

    • createLobby

      public void createLobby(String creatorName, String lobbyName, int playerNumber) throws ExistingLobbyException, InvalidLobbyNameException, IllegalPlayerNameException
      Create a new lobby and adds his name to the list of existing lobbies
      Parameters:
      creatorName - name of the player that creates the lobby
      lobbyName - unique name of the lobby
      playerNumber - number of players in the lobby
      Throws:
      ExistingLobbyException - if the name of the lobby is already used in another lobby
      InvalidLobbyNameException - if the name of the lobby is an empty string
      IllegalPlayerNameException - if the name of the player is an empty string

    • closeLobby

      public void closeLobby(Lobby lobby)
      Close the lobby and removes his name from the list of existing lobbies
      Parameters:
      lobby - reference to the lobby that need to be closed

    • addPlayer

      public void addPlayer(String lobby, String player) throws NonExistingLobbyException, NameTakenException, FullLobbyException, IllegalPlayerNameException
      Add a player to an existing lobby
      Parameters:
      lobby - name of the existing lobby
      player - name of the player that want to join the lobby
      Throws:
      NonExistingLobbyException - if the lobby doesn't already exist
      NameTakenException - if the name of the player is already taken from a player in the lobby
      FullLobbyException - if a player wants to join a lobby and the number of players in the lobby is equals to the maximum number of players
      IllegalPlayerNameException - if the name of the player is an empty string

    • getLobby

      public Lobby getLobby(String lobbyName) throws NonExistingLobbyException
      getter for a lobby
      Parameters:
      lobbyName - name of the lobby
      Returns:
      the reference to the lobby object linked to the name
      Throws:
      NonExistingLobbyException - it the lobby doesn't exist
